title: Digital Society Educational Material Design and Learning Effectiveness Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social sciences and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Design of digital materials optimized for smartphone-based learning environments and application of cognitive scaffolding strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can design digital educational materials by applying cognitive scaffolding strategies (contextual trigger questions, visual schematization).
Learners can develop social studies educational materials that integrate multimedia elements considering diverse learning styles.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively analyze the learning effectiveness of materials designed through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
